name: Pocket News
title: Frontend
Description: A simple website about news portal which is based on REST API made by myself. In this project you can see a dropdown menu with categories which has single pagination . View Details will redirects single dynamic details page. It's a frontend website. Also responsive for mobile and tablet.

name: React Application
title: Frontend
Description: A simple website about collecting user information based on REST API. Here you can see a user login form. Invalid infomation will show a error alert. After successfully login, you wil see a successful notification and redirect to user information details. There has a course selection section with dropdown menu. It's  responsive for mobile and tablet.

name: Theme Design
title: Frontend
Description: A simple website about theme design of any website. Here you can see a attractive dashboard, color combination and structure of feature section. Also have a table design which is responsive for mobile and tablet also. It's just a demo of frontend theme design based on react.

name: Kindness
title: Frontend
Description: A fronted website about donation. In this website ,there has a dropdown menu with icon. To click this, You will find some option. After clicking this options ,it will redirect to the section according to options. In this website, java script also used. Donating money you can see in Your Donation section.

name: Knowledge Door
title: Frontend
Description: A website about online library which is accessed by firebase. Anyone can visit  this site but to order any books a user have to sign in/sign up.There has a writers section which will be updated soon.
